attributes.action: Tariq Johan and Pauline Pearce for the House of Lords.
attributes.additional_details: We've been shocked by the riots.  Tariq Johan and Pauline Pearce have, in their different ways, given us some moral leadership.  Tariq Johan spoke eloquently to his local community after his son's murder in Birmingham.  Pauline Pearce spoke directly to looters in Hackney.  Give them some influence.  Make them members of the House of Lords so they can speak out and influence the reflection and debate that has to come.
